price: او له هغو كسانو هم مه كېږه چې د الله آيتونه يې دروغ وګڼل بيا به له تاوانيانو څخه شې.
arabic: وَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: walā takūnanna mina alladhīna kadhabū biāyāti al-lahi fatakūna mina al-khāsirīna
